ayah: يَسۡـَٔلُونَكَ عَنِ ٱلۡأَنفَالِۖ قُلِ ٱلۡأَنفَالُ لِلَّهِ وَٱلرَّسُولِۖ فَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَأَصۡلِحُواْ ذَاتَ بَيۡنِكُمۡۖ وَأَطِيعُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥٓ إِن كُنتُم مُّؤۡمِنِينَ
ayah_translit: yasalunaka ani al-anfali quli al-anfalu lillahi wal-rasuli fa-ittaqu al-laha wa-aslihu dhata baynikum wa-ati'u al-laha warasulahu in kuntum mu'minina
ayah_english: They ask you about the spoils of war Say The spoils of war (are) for Allah and the Messenger So fear Allah and set right that (which is) between you and obey Allah and His Messenger if you are believers

ayah: يَسۡـَٔلُونَكَ عَنِ ٱلۡأَنفَالِۖ قُلِ ٱلۡأَنفَالُ لِلَّهِ وَٱلرَّسُولِۖ فَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَأَصۡلِحُواْ ذَاتَ بَيۡنِكُمۡۖ وَأَطِيعُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥٓ إِن كُنتُم مُّؤۡمِنِينَ

ayah_english: They ask you about the spoils of war Say The spoils of war (are) for Allah and the Messenger So fear Allah and set right that (which is) between you and obey Allah and His Messenger if you are believers

ayah: إِنَّمَا ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ ٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا ذُكِرَ ٱللَّهُ وَجِلَتۡ قُلُوبُهُمۡ وَإِذَا تُلِيَتۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡ ءَايَٰتُهُۥ زَادَتۡهُمۡ إِيمَٰنٗا وَعَلَىٰ رَبِّهِمۡ يَتَوَكَّلُونَ
ayah_translit: innama al-mu'minuna alladhina idha dhukira al-lahu wajilat qulubuhum wa-idha tuliyat alayhim ayatuhu zadathum imanan wa'ala rabbihim yatawakkaluna
ayah_english: Only the believers (are) those who when is mentioned Allah feel fear their hearts and when are recited to them His Verses they increase them (in) faith and upon their Lord they put their trust

ayah: إِنَّمَا ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ ٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا ذُكِرَ ٱللَّهُ وَجِلَتۡ قُلُوبُهُمۡ وَإِذَا تُلِيَتۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡ ءَايَٰتُهُۥ زَادَتۡهُمۡ إِيمَٰنٗا وَعَلَىٰ رَبِّهِمۡ يَتَوَكَّلُونَ

ayah_translit: innama al-mu'minuna alladhina idha dhukira al-lahu wajilat qulubuhum wa-idha tuliyat alayhim ayatuhu zadathum imanan wa'ala rabbihim yatawakkaluna

ayah: ٱلَّذِينَ يُقِيمُونَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَمِمَّا رَزَقۡنَٰهُمۡ يُنفِقُونَ
ayah_translit: alladhina yuqimuna al-salata wamimma razaqnahum yunfiquna
ayah_english: Those who establish the prayer and out of what We have provided them they spend

ayah: أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ حَقّٗاۚ لَّهُمۡ دَرَجَٰتٌ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡ وَمَغۡفِرَةٞ وَرِزۡقٞ كَرِيمٞ
ayah_translit: ulaika humu al-mu'minuna haqqan lahum darajatun inda rabbihim wamaghfiratun wariz'qun karimun
ayah_english: Those they are the believers (in) truth For them (are) ranks with their Lord and forgiveness and a provision noble

ayah: كَمَآ أَخۡرَجَكَ رَبُّكَ مِنۢ بَيۡتِكَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَإِنَّ فَرِيقٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ لَكَٰرِهُونَ
ayah_translit: kama akhrajaka rabbuka min baytika bil-haqi wa-inna fariqan mina al-mu'minina lakarihuna
ayah_english: As brought you out your Lord from your home in truth while indeed a party among the believers certainly disliked

ayah_english: As brought you out your Lord from your home in truth while indeed a party among the believers certainly disliked

ayah: كَمَآ أَخۡرَجَكَ رَبُّكَ مِنۢ بَيۡتِكَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَإِنَّ فَرِيقٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ لَكَٰرِهُونَ

ayah: يُجَٰدِلُونَكَ فِي ٱلۡحَقِّ بَعۡدَمَا تَبَيَّنَ كَأَنَّمَا يُسَاقُونَ إِلَى ٱلۡمَوۡتِ وَهُمۡ يَنظُرُونَ
ayah_translit: yujadilunaka fi al-haqi ba'da ma tabayyana ka-annama yusaquna ila al-mawti wahum yanzuruna
ayah_english: They dispute with you concerning the truth after what was made clear as if they were driven to [the] death while they (were) looking

ayah: وَإِذۡ يَعِدُكُمُ ٱللَّهُ إِحۡدَى ٱلطَّآئِفَتَيۡنِ أَنَّهَا لَكُمۡ وَتَوَدُّونَ أَنَّ غَيۡرَ ذَاتِ ٱلشَّوۡكَةِ تَكُونُ لَكُمۡ وَيُرِيدُ ٱللَّهُ أَن يُحِقَّ ٱلۡحَقَّ بِكَلِمَٰتِهِۦ وَيَقۡطَعَ دَابِرَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ
ayah_translit: wa-idh ya'idukumu al-lahu ih'da al-taifatayni annaha lakum watawadduna anna ghayra dhati al-shawkati takunu lakum wayuridu al-lahu an yuhiqqa al-haqa bikalimatihi wayaqta'a dabira al-kafirina
ayah_english: And when promised you Allah one (of) the two groups that it (would be) for you and you wished that (one) other than that (of) the armed would be for you But intended Allah to justify the truth by His words and cut off (the) roots (of) the disbelievers

ayah: لِيُحِقَّ ٱلۡحَقَّ وَيُبۡطِلَ ٱلۡبَٰطِلَ وَلَوۡ كَرِهَ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ
ayah_translit: liyuhiqqa al-haqa wayub'tila al-batila walaw kariha al-muj'rimuna

ayah: إِذۡ تَسۡتَغِيثُونَ رَبَّكُمۡ فَٱسۡتَجَابَ لَكُمۡ أَنِّي مُمِدُّكُم بِأَلۡفٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡمَلَـٰٓئِكَةِ مُرۡدِفِينَ
ayah_translit: idh tastaghithuna rabbakum fa-is'tajaba lakum anni mumiddukum bi-alfin mina al-malaikati mur'difina
ayah_english: When you were seeking help (of) your Lord and He answered [to] you Indeed I am going to reinforce you with a thousand of the Angels one after another

ayah: إِذۡ تَسۡتَغِيثُونَ رَبَّكُمۡ فَٱسۡتَجَابَ لَكُمۡ أَنِّي مُمِدُّكُم بِأَلۡفٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡمَلَـٰٓئِكَةِ مُرۡدِفِينَ
ayah_translit: idh tastaghithuna rabbakum fa-is'tajaba lakum anni mumiddukum bi-alfin mina al-malaikati mur'difina

ayah_english: When you were seeking help (of) your Lord and He answered [to] you Indeed I am going to reinforce you with a thousand of the Angels one after another

ayah: وَمَا جَعَلَهُ ٱللَّهُ إِلَّا بُشۡرَىٰ وَلِتَطۡمَئِنَّ بِهِۦ قُلُوبُكُمۡۚ وَمَا ٱلنَّصۡرُ إِلَّا مِنۡ عِندِ ٱللَّهِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَزِيزٌ حَكِيمٌ
ayah_translit: wama ja'alahu al-lahu illa bush'ra walitatma-inna bihi qulubukum wama al-nasru illa min indi al-lahi inna al-laha azizun hakimun
ayah_english: And not (it was) made (by) Allah but good tidings and so that might be at rest with it your hearts And (there is) no [the] victory except from [of] Allah Indeed Allah (is) All-Mighty All-Wise

ayah: إِذۡ يُغَشِّيكُمُ ٱلنُّعَاسَ أَمَنَةٗ مِّنۡهُ وَيُنَزِّلُ عَلَيۡكُم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءٗ لِّيُطَهِّرَكُم بِهِۦ وَيُذۡهِبَ عَنكُمۡ رِجۡزَ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنِ وَلِيَرۡبِطَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِكُمۡ وَيُثَبِّتَ بِهِ ٱلۡأَقۡدَامَ
ayah_translit: idh yughashikumu al-nu'asa amanatan min'hu wayunazzilu alaykum mina al-samai maan liyutahhirakum bihi wayudh'hiba ankum rij'za al-shaytani waliyarbita ala qulubikum wayuthabbita bihi al-aqdama
ayah_english: When He covered you with [the] slumber a security from Him and sent down upon you from the sky water so that He may purify you with it and take away from you evil (suggestions) (of) the Shaitaan And to strengthen [on] your hearts and make firm with it your feet

ayah: إِذۡ يُغَشِّيكُمُ ٱلنُّعَاسَ أَمَنَةٗ مِّنۡهُ وَيُنَزِّلُ عَلَيۡكُم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءٗ لِّيُطَهِّرَكُم بِهِۦ وَيُذۡهِبَ عَنكُمۡ رِجۡزَ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنِ وَلِيَرۡبِطَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِكُمۡ وَيُثَبِّتَ بِهِ ٱلۡأَقۡدَامَ

ayah: إِذۡ يُغَشِّيكُمُ ٱلنُّعَاسَ أَمَنَةٗ مِّنۡهُ وَيُنَزِّلُ عَلَيۡكُم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءٗ لِّيُطَهِّرَكُم بِهِۦ وَيُذۡهِبَ عَنكُمۡ رِجۡزَ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنِ وَلِيَرۡبِطَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِكُمۡ وَيُثَبِّتَ بِهِ ٱلۡأَقۡدَامَ
ayah_translit: idh yughashikumu al-nu'asa amanatan min'hu wayunazzilu alaykum mina al-samai maan liyutahhirakum bihi wayudh'hiba ankum rij'za al-shaytani waliyarbita ala qulubikum wayuthabbita bihi al-aqdama
ayah_english: When He covered you with [the] slumber a security from Him and sent down upon you from the sky water so that He may purify you with it and take away from you evil (suggestions) (of) the Shaitaan And to strengthen [on] your hearts and make firm with it your feet

ayah: إِذۡ يُوحِي رَبُّكَ إِلَى ٱلۡمَلَـٰٓئِكَةِ أَنِّي مَعَكُمۡ فَثَبِّتُواْ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْۚ سَأُلۡقِي فِي قُلُوبِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ ٱلرُّعۡبَ فَٱضۡرِبُواْ فَوۡقَ ٱلۡأَعۡنَاقِ وَٱضۡرِبُواْ مِنۡهُمۡ كُلَّ بَنَانٖ
ayah_translit: idh yuhi rabbuka ila al-malaikati anni ma'akum fathabbitu alladhina amanu sa-ul'qi fi qulubi alladhina kafaru al-ru'ba fa-id'ribu fawqa al-a'naqi wa-id'ribu min'hum kulla bananin
ayah_english: When inspired your Lord to the Angels I am with you so strengthen those who believed I will cast in (the) hearts (of) those who disbelieved the terror so strike above the necks and strike from them every fingertip[s]

ayah: إِذۡ يُوحِي رَبُّكَ إِلَى ٱلۡمَلَـٰٓئِكَةِ أَنِّي مَعَكُمۡ فَثَبِّتُواْ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْۚ سَأُلۡقِي فِي قُلُوبِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ ٱلرُّعۡبَ فَٱضۡرِبُواْ فَوۡقَ ٱلۡأَعۡنَاقِ وَٱضۡرِبُواْ مِنۡهُمۡ كُلَّ بَنَانٖ

ayah: إِذۡ يُوحِي رَبُّكَ إِلَى ٱلۡمَلَـٰٓئِكَةِ أَنِّي مَعَكُمۡ فَثَبِّتُواْ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْۚ سَأُلۡقِي فِي قُلُوبِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ ٱلرُّعۡبَ فَٱضۡرِبُواْ فَوۡقَ ٱلۡأَعۡنَاقِ وَٱضۡرِبُواْ مِنۡهُمۡ كُلَّ بَنَانٖ

ayah: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمۡ شَآقُّواْ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥۚ وَمَن يُشَاقِقِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ شَدِيدُ ٱلۡعِقَابِ
ayah_translit: dhalika bi-annahum shaqqu al-laha warasulahu waman yushaqiqi al-laha warasulahu fa-inna al-laha shadidu al-'iqabi
ayah_english: That (is) because they opposed Allah and His Messenger And whoever opposes Allah and His Messenger then indeed Allah (is) severe in [the] penalty

ayah: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمۡ شَآقُّواْ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥۚ وَمَن يُشَاقِقِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ شَدِيدُ ٱلۡعِقَابِ

ayah: ذَٰلِكُمۡ فَذُوقُوهُ وَأَنَّ لِلۡكَٰفِرِينَ عَذَابَ ٱلنَّارِ
ayah_translit: dhalikum fadhuquhu wa-anna lil'kafirina adhaba al-nari
ayah_english: That So taste it And that for the disbelievers (is the) punishment (of) the Fire

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ إِذَا لَقِيتُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ زَحۡفٗا فَلَا تُوَلُّوهُمُ ٱلۡأَدۡبَارَ
ayah_translit: yaayyuha alladhina amanu idha laqitumu alladhina kafaru zahfan fala tuwalluhumu al-adbara
ayah_english: O you who believe When you meet those who disbelieve advancing then (do) not turn to them the backs

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ إِذَا لَقِيتُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ زَحۡفٗا فَلَا تُوَلُّوهُمُ ٱلۡأَدۡبَارَ
ayah_translit: yaayyuha alladhina amanu idha laqitumu alladhina kafaru zahfan fala tuwalluhumu al-adbara
ayah_english: O you who believe When you meet those who disbelieve advancing then (do) not turn to them the backs

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ إِذَا لَقِيتُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ زَحۡفٗا فَلَا تُوَلُّوهُمُ ٱلۡأَدۡبَارَ
ayah_translit: yaayyuha alladhina amanu idha laqitumu alladhina kafaru zahfan fala tuwalluhumu al-adbara
ayah_english: O you who believe When you meet those who disbelieve advancing then (do) not turn to them the backs

ayah: وَمَن يُوَلِّهِمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ دُبُرَهُۥٓ إِلَّا مُتَحَرِّفٗا لِّقِتَالٍ أَوۡ مُتَحَيِّزًا إِلَىٰ فِئَةٖ فَقَدۡ بَآءَ بِغَضَبٖ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَمَأۡوَىٰهُ جَهَنَّمُۖ وَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمَصِيرُ
ayah_translit: waman yuwallihim yawma-idhin duburahu illa mutaharrifan liqitalin aw mutahayyizan ila fi-atin faqad baa bighadabin mina al-lahi wamawahu jahannamu wabi'sa al-masiru
ayah_english: And whoever turns to them that day his back except (as) a strategy of war or (to) join to a group certainly (he has) incurred wrath of Allah and his abode (is) Hell a wretched destination

ayah: وَمَن يُوَلِّهِمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ دُبُرَهُۥٓ إِلَّا مُتَحَرِّفٗا لِّقِتَالٍ أَوۡ مُتَحَيِّزًا إِلَىٰ فِئَةٖ فَقَدۡ بَآءَ بِغَضَبٖ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَمَأۡوَىٰهُ جَهَنَّمُۖ وَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمَصِيرُ

ayah: فَلَمۡ تَقۡتُلُوهُمۡ وَلَٰكِنَّ ٱللَّهَ قَتَلَهُمۡۚ وَمَا رَمَيۡتَ إِذۡ رَمَيۡتَ وَلَٰكِنَّ ٱللَّهَ رَمَىٰ وَلِيُبۡلِيَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ مِنۡهُ بَلَآءً حَسَنًاۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٞ
ayah_translit: falam taqtuluhum walakinna al-laha qatalahum wama ramayta idh ramayta walakinna al-laha rama waliyub'liya al-mu'minina min'hu balaan hasanan inna al-laha sami'un alimun
ayah_english: And not you kill them but Allah killed them And not you threw when you threw but Allah threw and that He may test the believers from Him (with) a trial good Indeed Allah (is) All-Hearing All-Knowing

ayah: ذَٰلِكُمۡ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مُوهِنُ كَيۡدِ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

ayah: إِن تَسۡتَفۡتِحُواْ فَقَدۡ جَآءَكُمُ ٱلۡفَتۡحُۖ وَإِن تَنتَهُواْ فَهُوَ خَيۡرٞ لَّكُمۡۖ وَإِن تَعُودُواْ نَعُدۡ وَلَن تُغۡنِيَ عَنكُمۡ فِئَتُكُمۡ شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَوۡ كَثُرَتۡ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَعَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ
ayah_translit: in tastaftihu faqad jaakumu al-fathu wa-in tantahu fahuwa khayrun lakum wa-in ta'udu na'ud walan tugh'niya ankum fi-atukum shayan walaw kathurat wa-anna al-laha ma'a al-mu'minina
ayah_english: If you ask for victory then certainly has come to you the victory And if you desist then it (is) good for you but if you return We will return (too) And never will avail you your forces anything even if (they are) numerous And that Allah (is) with the believers

ayah: إِن تَسۡتَفۡتِحُواْ فَقَدۡ جَآءَكُمُ ٱلۡفَتۡحُۖ وَإِن تَنتَهُواْ فَهُوَ خَيۡرٞ لَّكُمۡۖ وَإِن تَعُودُواْ نَعُدۡ وَلَن تُغۡنِيَ عَنكُمۡ فِئَتُكُمۡ شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَوۡ كَثُرَتۡ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَعَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

ayah: إِن تَسۡتَفۡتِحُواْ فَقَدۡ جَآءَكُمُ ٱلۡفَتۡحُۖ وَإِن تَنتَهُواْ فَهُوَ خَيۡرٞ لَّكُمۡۖ وَإِن تَعُودُواْ نَعُدۡ وَلَن تُغۡنِيَ عَنكُمۡ فِئَتُكُمۡ شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَوۡ كَثُرَتۡ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَعَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ أَطِيعُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ وَلَا تَوَلَّوۡاْ عَنۡهُ وَأَنتُمۡ تَسۡمَعُونَ
ayah_translit: yaayyuha alladhina amanu ati'u al-laha warasulahu wala tawallaw anhu wa-antum tasma'una
ayah_english: O you who believe Obey Allah and His Messenger And (do) not turn away from him while you hear

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ أَطِيعُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ وَلَا تَوَلَّوۡاْ عَنۡهُ وَأَنتُمۡ تَسۡمَعُونَ

ayah: وَلَا تَكُونُواْ كَٱلَّذِينَ قَالُواْ سَمِعۡنَا وَهُمۡ لَا يَسۡمَعُونَ
ayah_translit: wala takunu ka-alladhina qalu sami'na wahum la yasma'una
ayah_english: And (do) not be like those who say We heard while they do not hear

ayah: وَلَا تَكُونُواْ كَٱلَّذِينَ قَالُواْ سَمِعۡنَا وَهُمۡ لَا يَسۡمَعُونَ

ayah_english: And (do) not be like those who say We heard while they do not hear

ayah: ۞إِنَّ شَرَّ ٱلدَّوَآبِّ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلصُّمُّ ٱلۡبُكۡمُ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَعۡقِلُونَ
ayah_translit: inna sharra al-dawabi inda al-lahi al-sumu al-buk'mu alladhina la ya'qiluna
ayah_english: Indeed worst (of) the living creatures near Allah (are) the deaf the dumb those who (do) not use their intellect

ayah: ۞إِنَّ شَرَّ ٱلدَّوَآبِّ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلصُّمُّ ٱلۡبُكۡمُ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَعۡقِلُونَ

ayah: وَلَوۡ عَلِمَ ٱللَّهُ فِيهِمۡ خَيۡرٗا لَّأَسۡمَعَهُمۡۖ وَلَوۡ أَسۡمَعَهُمۡ لَتَوَلَّواْ وَّهُم مُّعۡرِضُونَ
ayah_translit: walaw alima al-lahu fihim khayran la-asma'ahum walaw asma'ahum latawallaw wahum mu'riduna
ayah_english: And if (had) known Allah in them any good surely, He (would) have made them hear And if He had made them hear surely they would have turned away while they (were) averse

ayah: وَلَوۡ عَلِمَ ٱللَّهُ فِيهِمۡ خَيۡرٗا لَّأَسۡمَعَهُمۡۖ وَلَوۡ أَسۡمَعَهُمۡ لَتَوَلَّواْ وَّهُم مُّعۡرِضُونَ

ayah: وَلَوۡ عَلِمَ ٱللَّهُ فِيهِمۡ خَيۡرٗا لَّأَسۡمَعَهُمۡۖ وَلَوۡ أَسۡمَعَهُمۡ لَتَوَلَّواْ وَّهُم مُّعۡرِضُونَ

ayah_english: And if (had) known Allah in them any good surely, He (would) have made them hear And if He had made them hear surely they would have turned away while they (were) averse

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱسۡتَجِيبُواْ لِلَّهِ وَلِلرَّسُولِ إِذَا دَعَاكُمۡ لِمَا يُحۡيِيكُمۡۖ وَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَحُولُ بَيۡنَ ٱلۡمَرۡءِ وَقَلۡبِهِۦ وَأَنَّهُۥٓ إِلَيۡهِ تُحۡشَرُونَ
ayah_translit: yaayyuha alladhina amanu is'tajibu lillahi walilrrasuli idha da'akum lima yuh'yikum wa-i'lamu anna al-laha yahulu bayna al-mari waqalbihi wa-annahu ilayhi tuh'sharuna
ayah_english: O you who believe Respond to Allah and His Messenger when he calls you to what gives you life And know that Allah comes (in) between a man and his heart and that to Him you will be gathered

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱسۡتَجِيبُواْ لِلَّهِ وَلِلرَّسُولِ إِذَا دَعَاكُمۡ لِمَا يُحۡيِيكُمۡۖ وَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَحُولُ بَيۡنَ ٱلۡمَرۡءِ وَقَلۡبِهِۦ وَأَنَّهُۥٓ إِلَيۡهِ تُحۡشَرُونَ

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱسۡتَجِيبُواْ لِلَّهِ وَلِلرَّسُولِ إِذَا دَعَاكُمۡ لِمَا يُحۡيِيكُمۡۖ وَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَحُولُ بَيۡنَ ٱلۡمَرۡءِ وَقَلۡبِهِۦ وَأَنَّهُۥٓ إِلَيۡهِ تُحۡشَرُونَ
ayah_translit: yaayyuha alladhina amanu is'tajibu lillahi walilrrasuli idha da'akum lima yuh'yikum wa-i'lamu anna al-laha yahulu bayna al-mari waqalbihi wa-annahu ilayhi tuh'sharuna

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱسۡتَجِيبُواْ لِلَّهِ وَلِلرَّسُولِ إِذَا دَعَاكُمۡ لِمَا يُحۡيِيكُمۡۖ وَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَحُولُ بَيۡنَ ٱلۡمَرۡءِ وَقَلۡبِهِۦ وَأَنَّهُۥٓ إِلَيۡهِ تُحۡشَرُونَ

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱسۡتَجِيبُواْ لِلَّهِ وَلِلرَّسُولِ إِذَا دَعَاكُمۡ لِمَا يُحۡيِيكُمۡۖ وَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَحُولُ بَيۡنَ ٱلۡمَرۡءِ وَقَلۡبِهِۦ وَأَنَّهُۥٓ إِلَيۡهِ تُحۡشَرُونَ

ayah_english: O you who believe Respond to Allah and His Messenger when he calls you to what gives you life And know that Allah comes (in) between a man and his heart and that to Him you will be gathered

ayah: وَٱتَّقُواْ فِتۡنَةٗ لَّا تُصِيبَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ مِنكُمۡ خَآصَّةٗۖ وَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ شَدِيدُ ٱلۡعِقَابِ
ayah_translit: wa-ittaqu fit'natan la tusibanna alladhina zalamu minkum khassatan wa-i'lamu anna al-laha shadidu al-'iqabi
ayah_english: And fear a trial not which will afflict those who do wrong among you exclusively And know that Allah (is) severe (in) the penalty

ayah: وَٱذۡكُرُوٓاْ إِذۡ أَنتُمۡ قَلِيلٞ مُّسۡتَضۡعَفُونَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ تَخَافُونَ أَن يَتَخَطَّفَكُمُ ٱلنَّاسُ فَـَٔاوَىٰكُمۡ وَأَيَّدَكُم بِنَصۡرِهِۦ وَرَزَقَكُم مِّنَ ٱلطَّيِّبَٰتِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَشۡكُرُونَ
ayah_translit: wa-udh'kuru idh antum qalilun mus'tad'afuna fi al-ardi takhafuna an yatakhattafakumu al-nasu faawakum wa-ayyadakum binasrihi warazaqakum mina al-tayibati la'allakum tashkuruna
ayah_english: And remember when you (were) few (and) deemed weak in the earth fearing that might do away with you the men then He sheltered you and strengthened you with His help and provided you of the good things so that you may (be) thankful

ayah: وَٱذۡكُرُوٓاْ إِذۡ أَنتُمۡ قَلِيلٞ مُّسۡتَضۡعَفُونَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ تَخَافُونَ أَن يَتَخَطَّفَكُمُ ٱلنَّاسُ فَـَٔاوَىٰكُمۡ وَأَيَّدَكُم بِنَصۡرِهِۦ وَرَزَقَكُم مِّنَ ٱلطَّيِّبَٰتِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَشۡكُرُونَ

ayah_translit: wa-udh'kuru idh antum qalilun mus'tad'afuna fi al-ardi takhafuna an yatakhattafakumu al-nasu faawakum wa-ayyadakum binasrihi warazaqakum mina al-tayibati la'allakum tashkuruna

ayah: وَٱذۡكُرُوٓاْ إِذۡ أَنتُمۡ قَلِيلٞ مُّسۡتَضۡعَفُونَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ تَخَافُونَ أَن يَتَخَطَّفَكُمُ ٱلنَّاسُ فَـَٔاوَىٰكُمۡ وَأَيَّدَكُم بِنَصۡرِهِۦ وَرَزَقَكُم مِّنَ ٱلطَّيِّبَٰتِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَشۡكُرُونَ

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ لَا تَخُونُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَٱلرَّسُولَ وَتَخُونُوٓاْ أَمَٰنَٰتِكُمۡ وَأَنتُمۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ
ayah_translit: yaayyuha alladhina amanu la takhunu al-laha wal-rasula watakhunu amanatikum wa-antum ta'lamuna
ayah_english: O you who believe (Do) not betray Allah and the Messenger or betray your trusts while you know

ayah: وَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّمَآ أَمۡوَٰلُكُمۡ وَأَوۡلَٰدُكُمۡ فِتۡنَةٞ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ عِندَهُۥٓ أَجۡرٌ عَظِيمٞ
ayah_translit: wa-i'lamu annama amwalukum wa-awladukum fit'natun wa-anna al-laha indahu ajrun azimun
ayah_english: And know that your wealth and your children (are) a trial And that Allah with Him (is) a reward great

ayah: وَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّمَآ أَمۡوَٰلُكُمۡ وَأَوۡلَٰدُكُمۡ فِتۡنَةٞ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ عِندَهُۥٓ أَجۡرٌ عَظِيمٞ

ayah_english: And know that your wealth and your children (are) a trial And that Allah with Him (is) a reward great

ayah: وَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّمَآ أَمۡوَٰلُكُمۡ وَأَوۡلَٰدُكُمۡ فِتۡنَةٞ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ عِندَهُۥٓ أَجۡرٌ عَظِيمٞ
ayah_translit: wa-i'lamu annama amwalukum wa-awladukum fit'natun wa-anna al-laha indahu ajrun azimun
ayah_english: And know that your wealth and your children (are) a trial And that Allah with Him (is) a reward great

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ إِن تَتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ يَجۡعَل لَّكُمۡ فُرۡقَانٗا وَيُكَفِّرۡ عَنكُمۡ سَيِّـَٔاتِكُمۡ وَيَغۡفِرۡ لَكُمۡۗ وَٱللَّهُ ذُو ٱلۡفَضۡلِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ
ayah_translit: yaayyuha alladhina amanu in tattaqu al-laha yaj'al lakum fur'qanan wayukaffir ankum sayyiatikum wayaghfir lakum wal-lahu dhu al-fadli al-'azimi
ayah_english: O you who believe If you fear Allah He will grant you a criterion and will remove from you your evil deeds and forgive you And Allah (is) the Possessor (of) Bounty the Great

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ إِن تَتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ يَجۡعَل لَّكُمۡ فُرۡقَانٗا وَيُكَفِّرۡ عَنكُمۡ سَيِّـَٔاتِكُمۡ وَيَغۡفِرۡ لَكُمۡۗ وَٱللَّهُ ذُو ٱلۡفَضۡلِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ

ayah: وَإِذۡ يَمۡكُرُ بِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لِيُثۡبِتُوكَ أَوۡ يَقۡتُلُوكَ أَوۡ يُخۡرِجُوكَۚ وَيَمۡكُرُونَ وَيَمۡكُرُ ٱللَّهُۖ وَٱللَّهُ خَيۡرُ ٱلۡمَٰكِرِينَ
ayah_translit: wa-idh yamkuru bika alladhina kafaru liyuth'bituka aw yaqtuluka aw yukh'rijuka wayamkuruna wayamkuru al-lahu wal-lahu khayru al-makirina
ayah_english: And when plotted against you those who disbelieved that they restrain you or kill you or drive you out And they were planning and (also) was planning Allah And Allah is (the) Best (of) the Planners

ayah: وَإِذۡ يَمۡكُرُ بِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لِيُثۡبِتُوكَ أَوۡ يَقۡتُلُوكَ أَوۡ يُخۡرِجُوكَۚ وَيَمۡكُرُونَ وَيَمۡكُرُ ٱللَّهُۖ وَٱللَّهُ خَيۡرُ ٱلۡمَٰكِرِينَ

ayah: وَإِذَا تُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡهِمۡ ءَايَٰتُنَا قَالُواْ قَدۡ سَمِعۡنَا لَوۡ نَشَآءُ لَقُلۡنَا مِثۡلَ هَٰذَآ إِنۡ هَٰذَآ إِلَّآ أَسَٰطِيرُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ
ayah_translit: wa-idha tut'la alayhim ayatuna qalu qad sami'na law nashau laqul'na mith'la hadha in hadha illa asatiru al-awalina
ayah_english: And when are recited to them Our Verses they say Verily we have heard if we wish surely, we could say like this Not is this but tales (of) the former (people)

ayah_translit: wa-idha tut'la alayhim ayatuna qalu qad sami'na law nashau laqul'na mith'la hadha in hadha illa asatiru al-awalina
ayah_english: And when are recited to them Our Verses they say Verily we have heard if we wish surely, we could say like this Not is this but tales (of) the former (people)

ayah: وَإِذۡ قَالُواْ ٱللَّهُمَّ إِن كَانَ هَٰذَا هُوَ ٱلۡحَقَّ مِنۡ عِندِكَ فَأَمۡطِرۡ عَلَيۡنَا حِجَارَةٗ مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ أَوِ ٱئۡتِنَا بِعَذَابٍ أَلِيمٖ
ayah_translit: wa-idh qalu al-lahuma in kana hadha huwa al-haqa min indika fa-amtir alayna hijaratan mina al-samai awi i'tina bi'adhabin alimin
ayah_english: And when they said O Allah If was this [it] the truth [of] from You then (send) rain upon us (of) stones from the sky or bring (upon) us a punishment painful

ayah: وَمَا كَانَ ٱللَّهُ لِيُعَذِّبَهُمۡ وَأَنتَ فِيهِمۡۚ وَمَا كَانَ ٱللَّهُ مُعَذِّبَهُمۡ وَهُمۡ يَسۡتَغۡفِرُونَ
ayah_translit: wama kana al-lahu liyu'adhibahum wa-anta fihim wama kana al-lahu mu'adhibahum wahum yastaghfiruna
ayah_english: But not is (for) Allah that He punishes them while you (are) among them and not is Allah the One Who punishes them while they seek forgiveness

ayah: وَمَا كَانَ ٱللَّهُ لِيُعَذِّبَهُمۡ وَأَنتَ فِيهِمۡۚ وَمَا كَانَ ٱللَّهُ مُعَذِّبَهُمۡ وَهُمۡ يَسۡتَغۡفِرُونَ
ayah_translit: wama kana al-lahu liyu'adhibahum wa-anta fihim wama kana al-lahu mu'adhibahum wahum yastaghfiruna
ayah_english: But not is (for) Allah that He punishes them while you (are) among them and not is Allah the One Who punishes them while they seek forgiveness

ayah: وَمَا كَانَ ٱللَّهُ لِيُعَذِّبَهُمۡ وَأَنتَ فِيهِمۡۚ وَمَا كَانَ ٱللَّهُ مُعَذِّبَهُمۡ وَهُمۡ يَسۡتَغۡفِرُونَ
ayah_translit: wama kana al-lahu liyu'adhibahum wa-anta fihim wama kana al-lahu mu'adhibahum wahum yastaghfiruna
ayah_english: But not is (for) Allah that He punishes them while you (are) among them and not is Allah the One Who punishes them while they seek forgiveness

ayah: وَمَا لَهُمۡ أَلَّا يُعَذِّبَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ وَهُمۡ يَصُدُّونَ عَنِ ٱلۡمَسۡجِدِ ٱلۡحَرَامِ وَمَا كَانُوٓاْ أَوۡلِيَآءَهُۥٓۚ إِنۡ أَوۡلِيَآؤُهُۥٓ إِلَّا ٱلۡمُتَّقُونَ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ
ayah_translit: wama lahum alla yu'adhibahumu al-lahu wahum yasudduna ani al-masjidi al-harami wama kanu awliyaahu in awliyauhu illa al-mutaquna walakinna aktharahum la ya'lamuna
ayah_english: But what (is) for them that not (should) punish them Allah while they hinder (people) from Al-Masjid Al-Haraam while not they are its guardians Not (can be) its guardians except the ones who fear Allah but most of them (do) not know

ayah: وَمَا لَهُمۡ أَلَّا يُعَذِّبَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ وَهُمۡ يَصُدُّونَ عَنِ ٱلۡمَسۡجِدِ ٱلۡحَرَامِ وَمَا كَانُوٓاْ أَوۡلِيَآءَهُۥٓۚ إِنۡ أَوۡلِيَآؤُهُۥٓ إِلَّا ٱلۡمُتَّقُونَ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ
ayah_translit: wama lahum alla yu'adhibahumu al-lahu wahum yasudduna ani al-masjidi al-harami wama kanu awliyaahu in awliyauhu illa al-mutaquna walakinna aktharahum la ya'lamuna
ayah_english: But what (is) for them that not (should) punish them Allah while they hinder (people) from Al-Masjid Al-Haraam while not they are its guardians Not (can be) its guardians except the ones who fear Allah but most of them (do) not know

ayah_translit: wama lahum alla yu'adhibahumu al-lahu wahum yasudduna ani al-masjidi al-harami wama kanu awliyaahu in awliyauhu illa al-mutaquna walakinna aktharahum la ya'lamuna
ayah_english: But what (is) for them that not (should) punish them Allah while they hinder (people) from Al-Masjid Al-Haraam while not they are its guardians Not (can be) its guardians except the ones who fear Allah but most of them (do) not know

ayah: وَمَا كَانَ صَلَاتُهُمۡ عِندَ ٱلۡبَيۡتِ إِلَّا مُكَآءٗ وَتَصۡدِيَةٗۚ فَذُوقُواْ ٱلۡعَذَابَ بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَكۡفُرُونَ
ayah_translit: wama kana salatuhum inda al-bayti illa mukaan watasdiyatan fadhuqu al-'adhaba bima kuntum takfuruna
ayah_english: And not was their prayer at the House except whistling and clapping So taste the punishment because you used to disbelieve

ayah_translit: wama kana salatuhum inda al-bayti illa mukaan watasdiyatan fadhuqu al-'adhaba bima kuntum takfuruna
ayah_english: And not was their prayer at the House except whistling and clapping So taste the punishment because you used to disbelieve

ayah: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ يُنفِقُونَ أَمۡوَٰلَهُمۡ لِيَصُدُّواْ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِۚ فَسَيُنفِقُونَهَا ثُمَّ تَكُونُ عَلَيۡهِمۡ حَسۡرَةٗ ثُمَّ يُغۡلَبُونَۗ وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ جَهَنَّمَ يُحۡشَرُونَ
ayah_translit: inna alladhina kafaru yunfiquna amwalahum liyasuddu an sabili al-lahi fasayunfiqunaha thumma takunu alayhim hasratan thumma yugh'labuna wa-alladhina kafaru ila jahannama yuh'sharuna
ayah_english: Indeed those who disbelieve they spend their wealth to hinder (people) from (the) way (of) Allah So they will spend it then it will be for them a regret then they will be overcome And those who disbelieve to Hell they will be gathered

ayah: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ يُنفِقُونَ أَمۡوَٰلَهُمۡ لِيَصُدُّواْ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِۚ فَسَيُنفِقُونَهَا ثُمَّ تَكُونُ عَلَيۡهِمۡ حَسۡرَةٗ ثُمَّ يُغۡلَبُونَۗ وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ جَهَنَّمَ يُحۡشَرُونَ

ayah_english: Indeed those who disbelieve they spend their wealth to hinder (people) from (the) way (of) Allah So they will spend it then it will be for them a regret then they will be overcome And those who disbelieve to Hell they will be gathered

ayah: لِيَمِيزَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡخَبِيثَ مِنَ ٱلطَّيِّبِ وَيَجۡعَلَ ٱلۡخَبِيثَ بَعۡضَهُۥ عَلَىٰ بَعۡضٖ فَيَرۡكُمَهُۥ جَمِيعٗا فَيَجۡعَلَهُۥ فِي جَهَنَّمَۚ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡخَٰسِرُونَ
ayah_translit: liyamiza al-lahu al-khabitha mina al-tayibi wayaj'ala al-khabitha ba'dahu ala ba'din fayarkumahu jami'an fayaj'alahu fi jahannama ulaika humu al-khasiruna
ayah_english: That may distinguish Allah the wicked from the good and place the wicked some of them on others and heap them all together and put them in Hell Those they (are) the losers

ayah: لِيَمِيزَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡخَبِيثَ مِنَ ٱلطَّيِّبِ وَيَجۡعَلَ ٱلۡخَبِيثَ بَعۡضَهُۥ عَلَىٰ بَعۡضٖ فَيَرۡكُمَهُۥ جَمِيعٗا فَيَجۡعَلَهُۥ فِي جَهَنَّمَۚ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡخَٰسِرُونَ
ayah_translit: liyamiza al-lahu al-khabitha mina al-tayibi wayaj'ala al-khabitha ba'dahu ala ba'din fayarkumahu jami'an fayaj'alahu fi jahannama ulaika humu al-khasiruna

ayah_english: That may distinguish Allah the wicked from the good and place the wicked some of them on others and heap them all together and put them in Hell Those they (are) the losers

ayah: قُل لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓاْ إِن يَنتَهُواْ يُغۡفَرۡ لَهُم مَّا قَدۡ سَلَفَ وَإِن يَعُودُواْ فَقَدۡ مَضَتۡ سُنَّتُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ
ayah_translit: qul lilladhina kafaru in yantahu yugh'far lahum ma qad salafa wa-in ya'udu faqad madat sunnatu al-awalina
ayah_english: Say to those who disbelieve if they cease will be forgiven for them what [verily] (is) past But if they return then verily preceded (the) practice (of) the former (people)

ayah: قُل لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓاْ إِن يَنتَهُواْ يُغۡفَرۡ لَهُم مَّا قَدۡ سَلَفَ وَإِن يَعُودُواْ فَقَدۡ مَضَتۡ سُنَّتُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

ayah_english: Say to those who disbelieve if they cease will be forgiven for them what [verily] (is) past But if they return then verily preceded (the) practice (of) the former (people)

ayah: وَقَٰتِلُوهُمۡ حَتَّىٰ لَا تَكُونَ فِتۡنَةٞ وَيَكُونَ ٱلدِّينُ كُلُّهُۥ لِلَّهِۚ فَإِنِ ٱنتَهَوۡاْ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِمَا يَعۡمَلُونَ بَصِيرٞ
ayah_translit: waqatiluhum hatta la takuna fit'natun wayakuna al-dinu kulluhu lillahi fa-ini intahaw fa-inna al-laha bima ya'maluna basirun
ayah_english: And fight them until not there is oppression and is the religion all of it for Allah But if they ceased then indeed Allah of what they do (is) All-Seer

ayah: وَقَٰتِلُوهُمۡ حَتَّىٰ لَا تَكُونَ فِتۡنَةٞ وَيَكُونَ ٱلدِّينُ كُلُّهُۥ لِلَّهِۚ فَإِنِ ٱنتَهَوۡاْ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِمَا يَعۡمَلُونَ بَصِيرٞ

ayah: وَقَٰتِلُوهُمۡ حَتَّىٰ لَا تَكُونَ فِتۡنَةٞ وَيَكُونَ ٱلدِّينُ كُلُّهُۥ لِلَّهِۚ فَإِنِ ٱنتَهَوۡاْ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِمَا يَعۡمَلُونَ بَصِيرٞ
ayah_translit: waqatiluhum hatta la takuna fit'natun wayakuna al-dinu kulluhu lillahi fa-ini intahaw fa-inna al-laha bima ya'maluna basirun

ayah_english: And fight them until not there is oppression and is the religion all of it for Allah But if they ceased then indeed Allah of what they do (is) All-Seer

ayah: وَإِن تَوَلَّوۡاْ فَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَوۡلَىٰكُمۡۚ نِعۡمَ ٱلۡمَوۡلَىٰ وَنِعۡمَ ٱلنَّصِيرُ
ayah_translit: wa-in tawallaw fa-i'lamu anna al-laha mawlakum ni'ma al-mawla wani'ma al-nasiru
ayah_english: And if they turn away then know that Allah (is) your Protector Excellent (is) the Protector and Excellent (is) the Helper

ayah: وَإِن تَوَلَّوۡاْ فَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَوۡلَىٰكُمۡۚ نِعۡمَ ٱلۡمَوۡلَىٰ وَنِعۡمَ ٱلنَّصِيرُ

ayah_translit: wa-in tawallaw fa-i'lamu anna al-laha mawlakum ni'ma al-mawla wani'ma al-nasiru
ayah_english: And if they turn away then know that Allah (is) your Protector Excellent (is) the Protector and Excellent (is) the Helper

ayah: ۞وَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّمَا غَنِمۡتُم مِّن شَيۡءٖ فَأَنَّ لِلَّهِ خُمُسَهُۥ وَلِلرَّسُولِ وَلِذِي ٱلۡقُرۡبَىٰ وَٱلۡيَتَٰمَىٰ وَٱلۡمَسَٰكِينِ وَٱبۡنِ ٱلسَّبِيلِ إِن كُنتُمۡ ءَامَنتُم بِٱللَّهِ وَمَآ أَنزَلۡنَا عَلَىٰ عَبۡدِنَا يَوۡمَ ٱلۡفُرۡقَانِ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡتَقَى ٱلۡجَمۡعَانِۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٌ
ayah_translit: wa-i'lamu annama ghanim'tum min shayin fa-anna lillahi khumusahu walilrrasuli walidhi al-qur'ba wal-yatama wal-masakini wa-ib'ni al-sabili in kuntum amantum bil-lahi wama anzalna ala abdina yawma al-fur'qani yawma al-taqa al-jam'ani wal-lahu ala kulli shayin qadirun
ayah_english: And know that what you obtain (as) spoils of war of anything then that for Allah (is) one fifth of it and for the Messenger and for the near relatives and the orphans and the needy and the wayfarer if you believe in Allah and (in) what We sent down to Our slave (on the) day (of) the criterion (the) day (when) met the two forces And Allah (is) on every thing All-Powerful

ayah: ۞وَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّمَا غَنِمۡتُم مِّن شَيۡءٖ فَأَنَّ لِلَّهِ خُمُسَهُۥ وَلِلرَّسُولِ وَلِذِي ٱلۡقُرۡبَىٰ وَٱلۡيَتَٰمَىٰ وَٱلۡمَسَٰكِينِ وَٱبۡنِ ٱلسَّبِيلِ إِن كُنتُمۡ ءَامَنتُم بِٱللَّهِ وَمَآ أَنزَلۡنَا عَلَىٰ عَبۡدِنَا يَوۡمَ ٱلۡفُرۡقَانِ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡتَقَى ٱلۡجَمۡعَانِۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٌ

ayah: ۞وَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّمَا غَنِمۡتُم مِّن شَيۡءٖ فَأَنَّ لِلَّهِ خُمُسَهُۥ وَلِلرَّسُولِ وَلِذِي ٱلۡقُرۡبَىٰ وَٱلۡيَتَٰمَىٰ وَٱلۡمَسَٰكِينِ وَٱبۡنِ ٱلسَّبِيلِ إِن كُنتُمۡ ءَامَنتُم بِٱللَّهِ وَمَآ أَنزَلۡنَا عَلَىٰ عَبۡدِنَا يَوۡمَ ٱلۡفُرۡقَانِ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡتَقَى ٱلۡجَمۡعَانِۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٌ

ayah: ۞وَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّمَا غَنِمۡتُم مِّن شَيۡءٖ فَأَنَّ لِلَّهِ خُمُسَهُۥ وَلِلرَّسُولِ وَلِذِي ٱلۡقُرۡبَىٰ وَٱلۡيَتَٰمَىٰ وَٱلۡمَسَٰكِينِ وَٱبۡنِ ٱلسَّبِيلِ إِن كُنتُمۡ ءَامَنتُم بِٱللَّهِ وَمَآ أَنزَلۡنَا عَلَىٰ عَبۡدِنَا يَوۡمَ ٱلۡفُرۡقَانِ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡتَقَى ٱلۡجَمۡعَانِۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٌ
ayah_translit: wa-i'lamu annama ghanim'tum min shayin fa-anna lillahi khumusahu walilrrasuli walidhi al-qur'ba wal-yatama wal-masakini wa-ib'ni al-sabili in kuntum amantum bil-lahi wama anzalna ala abdina yawma al-fur'qani yawma al-taqa al-jam'ani wal-lahu ala kulli shayin qadirun
ayah_english: And know that what you obtain (as) spoils of war of anything then that for Allah (is) one fifth of it and for the Messenger and for the near relatives and the orphans and the needy and the wayfarer if you believe in Allah and (in) what We sent down to Our slave (on the) day (of) the criterion (the) day (when) met the two forces And Allah (is) on every thing All-Powerful

ayah_translit: wa-i'lamu annama ghanim'tum min shayin fa-anna lillahi khumusahu walilrrasuli walidhi al-qur'ba wal-yatama wal-masakini wa-ib'ni al-sabili in kuntum amantum bil-lahi wama anzalna ala abdina yawma al-fur'qani yawma al-taqa al-jam'ani wal-lahu ala kulli shayin qadirun
ayah_english: And know that what you obtain (as) spoils of war of anything then that for Allah (is) one fifth of it and for the Messenger and for the near relatives and the orphans and the needy and the wayfarer if you believe in Allah and (in) what We sent down to Our slave (on the) day (of) the criterion (the) day (when) met the two forces And Allah (is) on every thing All-Powerful

ayah: إِذۡ أَنتُم بِٱلۡعُدۡوَةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَهُم بِٱلۡعُدۡوَةِ ٱلۡقُصۡوَىٰ وَٱلرَّكۡبُ أَسۡفَلَ مِنكُمۡۚ وَلَوۡ تَوَاعَدتُّمۡ لَٱخۡتَلَفۡتُمۡ فِي ٱلۡمِيعَٰدِ وَلَٰكِن لِّيَقۡضِيَ ٱللَّهُ أَمۡرٗا كَانَ مَفۡعُولٗا لِّيَهۡلِكَ مَنۡ هَلَكَ عَنۢ بَيِّنَةٖ وَيَحۡيَىٰ مَنۡ حَيَّ عَنۢ بَيِّنَةٖۗ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَسَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌ
ayah_translit: idh antum bil-'ud'wati al-dun'ya wahum bil-'ud'wati al-qus'wa wal-rakbu asfala minkum walaw tawa'adttum la-ikh'talaftum fi al-mi'adi walakin liyaqdiya al-lahu amran kana maf'ulan liyahlika man halaka an bayyinatin wayahya man hayya an bayyinatin wa-inna al-laha lasami'un alimun
ayah_english: When you (were) on side of the valley the nearer and they (were) on the side the farther and the caravan (was) lower than you And if you (had) made an appointment certainly you would have failed in the appointment But that might accomplish Allah a matter (that) was destined that (might be) destroyed (those) who (were to be) destroyed on a clear evidence and (might) live (those) who (were to) live on a clear evidence And indeed Allah (is) All-Hearing All-Knowing

ayah_english: When you (were) on side of the valley the nearer and they (were) on the side the farther and the caravan (was) lower than you And if you (had) made an appointment certainly you would have failed in the appointment But that might accomplish Allah a matter (that) was destined that (might be) destroyed (those) who (were to be) destroyed on a clear evidence and (might) live (those) who (were to) live on a clear evidence And indeed Allah (is) All-Hearing All-Knowing

ayah: إِذۡ يُرِيكَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ فِي مَنَامِكَ قَلِيلٗاۖ وَلَوۡ أَرَىٰكَهُمۡ كَثِيرٗا لَّفَشِلۡتُمۡ وَلَتَنَٰزَعۡتُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَمۡرِ وَلَٰكِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَلَّمَۚ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِيمُۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ
ayah_translit: idh yurikahumu al-lahu fi manamika qalilan walaw arakahum kathiran lafashil'tum walatanaza'tum fi al-amri walakinna al-laha sallama innahu alimun bidhati al-suduri
ayah_english: When you (where) shown them (by) Allah in your dream (as) few and if He had shown them to you (as) many surely you would have lost courage and surely you would have disputed in the matter but Allah saved (you) Indeed, He (is) All-Knower of what is in the breasts

ayah_english: When you (where) shown them (by) Allah in your dream (as) few and if He had shown them to you (as) many surely you would have lost courage and surely you would have disputed in the matter but Allah saved (you) Indeed, He (is) All-Knower of what is in the breasts

ayah: وَإِذۡ يُرِيكُمُوهُمۡ إِذِ ٱلۡتَقَيۡتُمۡ فِيٓ أَعۡيُنِكُمۡ قَلِيلٗا وَيُقَلِّلُكُمۡ فِيٓ أَعۡيُنِهِمۡ لِيَقۡضِيَ ٱللَّهُ أَمۡرٗا كَانَ مَفۡعُولٗاۗ وَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ تُرۡجَعُ ٱلۡأُمُورُ
ayah_translit: wa-idh yurikumuhum idhi al-taqaytum fi a'yunikum qalilan wayuqallilukum fi a'yunihim liyaqdiya al-lahu amran kana maf'ulan wa-ila al-lahi tur'ja'u al-umuru
ayah_english: And when He showed them to you when you met in your eyes (as) few and He made you (appear) as few in their eyes that might accomplish Allah might accomplish a matter (that) was (already) destined And to Allah return (all) the matters

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ إِذَا لَقِيتُمۡ فِئَةٗ فَٱثۡبُتُواْ وَٱذۡكُرُواْ ٱللَّهَ كَثِيرٗا لَّعَلَّكُمۡ تُفۡلِحُونَ
ayah_translit: yaayyuha alladhina amanu idha laqitum fi-atan fa-uth'butu wa-udh'kuru al-laha kathiran la'allakum tuf'lihuna
ayah_english: O you who believe When you meet a force then be firm and remember Allah much so that you may (be) successful

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ إِذَا لَقِيتُمۡ فِئَةٗ فَٱثۡبُتُواْ وَٱذۡكُرُواْ ٱللَّهَ كَثِيرٗا لَّعَلَّكُمۡ تُفۡلِحُونَ
ayah_translit: yaayyuha alladhina amanu idha laqitum fi-atan fa-uth'butu wa-udh'kuru al-laha kathiran la'allakum tuf'lihuna
ayah_english: O you who believe When you meet a force then be firm and remember Allah much so that you may (be) successful

ayah_english: O you who believe When you meet a force then be firm and remember Allah much so that you may (be) successful

ayah: وَأَطِيعُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ وَلَا تَنَٰزَعُواْ فَتَفۡشَلُواْ وَتَذۡهَبَ رِيحُكُمۡۖ وَٱصۡبِرُوٓاْۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَعَ ٱلصَّـٰبِرِينَ
ayah_translit: wa-ati'u al-laha warasulahu wala tanaza'u fatafshalu watadhhaba rihukum wa-is'biru inna al-laha ma'a al-sabirina
ayah_english: And obey Allah and His Messenger and (do) not dispute lest you lose courage and (would) depart your strength and be patient Indeed Allah (is) with the patient ones

ayah: وَأَطِيعُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ وَلَا تَنَٰزَعُواْ فَتَفۡشَلُواْ وَتَذۡهَبَ رِيحُكُمۡۖ وَٱصۡبِرُوٓاْۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَعَ ٱلصَّـٰبِرِينَ

ayah_english: And obey Allah and His Messenger and (do) not dispute lest you lose courage and (would) depart your strength and be patient Indeed Allah (is) with the patient ones

ayah_english: And obey Allah and His Messenger and (do) not dispute lest you lose courage and (would) depart your strength and be patient Indeed Allah (is) with the patient ones

ayah: وَلَا تَكُونُواْ كَٱلَّذِينَ خَرَجُواْ مِن دِيَٰرِهِم بَطَرٗا وَرِئَآءَ ٱلنَّاسِ وَيَصُدُّونَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِمَا يَعۡمَلُونَ مُحِيطٞ
ayah_translit: wala takunu ka-alladhina kharaju min diyarihim bataran wariaa al-nasi wayasudduna an sabili al-lahi wal-lahu bima ya'maluna muhitun
ayah_english: And (do) not be like those who came forth from their homes boastfully and showing off (to) the people and hinder (them) from (the) way (of) Allah And Allah of what they do (is) All-Encompassing

ayah: وَلَا تَكُونُواْ كَٱلَّذِينَ خَرَجُواْ مِن دِيَٰرِهِم بَطَرٗا وَرِئَآءَ ٱلنَّاسِ وَيَصُدُّونَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِمَا يَعۡمَلُونَ مُحِيطٞ

ayah: وَلَا تَكُونُواْ كَٱلَّذِينَ خَرَجُواْ مِن دِيَٰرِهِم بَطَرٗا وَرِئَآءَ ٱلنَّاسِ وَيَصُدُّونَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِمَا يَعۡمَلُونَ مُحِيطٞ
ayah_translit: wala takunu ka-alladhina kharaju min diyarihim bataran wariaa al-nasi wayasudduna an sabili al-lahi wal-lahu bima ya'maluna muhitun
ayah_english: And (do) not be like those who came forth from their homes boastfully and showing off (to) the people and hinder (them) from (the) way (of) Allah And Allah of what they do (is) All-Encompassing

ayah: وَلَا تَكُونُواْ كَٱلَّذِينَ خَرَجُواْ مِن دِيَٰرِهِم بَطَرٗا وَرِئَآءَ ٱلنَّاسِ وَيَصُدُّونَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِمَا يَعۡمَلُونَ مُحِيطٞ

ayah_translit: wala takunu ka-alladhina kharaju min diyarihim bataran wariaa al-nasi wayasudduna an sabili al-lahi wal-lahu bima ya'maluna muhitun
ayah_english: And (do) not be like those who came forth from their homes boastfully and showing off (to) the people and hinder (them) from (the) way (of) Allah And Allah of what they do (is) All-Encompassing

ayah: وَإِذۡ زَيَّنَ لَهُمُ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ وَقَالَ لَا غَالِبَ لَكُمُ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ مِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ وَإِنِّي جَارٞ لَّكُمۡۖ فَلَمَّا تَرَآءَتِ ٱلۡفِئَتَانِ نَكَصَ عَلَىٰ عَقِبَيۡهِ وَقَالَ إِنِّي بَرِيٓءٞ مِّنكُمۡ إِنِّيٓ أَرَىٰ مَا لَا تَرَوۡنَ إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ ٱللَّهَۚ وَٱللَّهُ شَدِيدُ ٱلۡعِقَابِ
ayah_translit: wa-idh zayyana lahumu al-shaytanu a'malahum waqala la ghaliba lakumu al-yawma mina al-nasi wa-inni jarun lakum falamma taraati al-fi-atani nakasa ala aqibayhi waqala inni barion minkum inni ara ma la tarawna inni akhafu al-laha wal-lahu shadidu al-'iqabi
ayah_english: And when made fair-seeming to them the Shaitaan their deeds and he said No (one) (can) overcome [to] you today from the people and indeed, I am a neighbor for you But when came in sight the two forces he turned away on his heels and said Indeed, I am free of you Indeed, I see what not you see indeed, I [I] fear Allah And Allah (is) severe (in) the penalty

ayah: وَإِذۡ زَيَّنَ لَهُمُ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ وَقَالَ لَا غَالِبَ لَكُمُ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ مِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ وَإِنِّي جَارٞ لَّكُمۡۖ فَلَمَّا تَرَآءَتِ ٱلۡفِئَتَانِ نَكَصَ عَلَىٰ عَقِبَيۡهِ وَقَالَ إِنِّي بَرِيٓءٞ مِّنكُمۡ إِنِّيٓ أَرَىٰ مَا لَا تَرَوۡنَ إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ ٱللَّهَۚ وَٱللَّهُ شَدِيدُ ٱلۡعِقَابِ
ayah_translit: wa-idh zayyana lahumu al-shaytanu a'malahum waqala la ghaliba lakumu al-yawma mina al-nasi wa-inni jarun lakum falamma taraati al-fi-atani nakasa ala aqibayhi waqala inni barion minkum inni ara ma la tarawna inni akhafu al-laha wal-lahu shadidu al-'iqabi

ayah_english: And when made fair-seeming to them the Shaitaan their deeds and he said No (one) (can) overcome [to] you today from the people and indeed, I am a neighbor for you But when came in sight the two forces he turned away on his heels and said Indeed, I am free of you Indeed, I see what not you see indeed, I [I] fear Allah And Allah (is) severe (in) the penalty

ayah: إِذۡ يَقُولُ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقُونَ وَٱلَّذِينَ فِي قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌ غَرَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ دِينُهُمۡۗ وَمَن يَتَوَكَّلۡ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَزِيزٌ حَكِيمٞ
ayah_translit: idh yaqulu al-munafiquna wa-alladhina fi qulubihim maradun gharra haulai dinuhum waman yatawakkal ala al-lahi fa-inna al-laha azizun hakimun
ayah_english: When said the hypocrites and those who in their hearts (was) a disease (Had) deluded these (people) their religion But whoever puts (his) trust in Allah then indeed Allah (is) All-Mighty All-Wise

ayah: إِذۡ يَقُولُ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقُونَ وَٱلَّذِينَ فِي قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌ غَرَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ دِينُهُمۡۗ وَمَن يَتَوَكَّلۡ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَزِيزٌ حَكِيمٞ

ayah: وَلَوۡ تَرَىٰٓ إِذۡ يَتَوَفَّى ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ ٱلۡمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ يَضۡرِبُونَ وُجُوهَهُمۡ وَأَدۡبَٰرَهُمۡ وَذُوقُواْ عَذَابَ ٱلۡحَرِيقِ
ayah_translit: walaw tara idh yatawaffa alladhina kafaru al-malaikatu yadribuna wujuhahum wa-adbarahum wadhuqu adhaba al-hariqi
ayah_english: And if you (could) see when take away souls (of) those who disbelieve the Angels striking their faces and their backs Taste (the) punishment (of) the Blazing Fire

ayah: وَلَوۡ تَرَىٰٓ إِذۡ يَتَوَفَّى ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ ٱلۡمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ يَضۡرِبُونَ وُجُوهَهُمۡ وَأَدۡبَٰرَهُمۡ وَذُوقُواْ عَذَابَ ٱلۡحَرِيقِ

ayah: وَلَوۡ تَرَىٰٓ إِذۡ يَتَوَفَّى ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ ٱلۡمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ يَضۡرِبُونَ وُجُوهَهُمۡ وَأَدۡبَٰرَهُمۡ وَذُوقُواْ عَذَابَ ٱلۡحَرِيقِ
ayah_translit: walaw tara idh yatawaffa alladhina kafaru al-malaikatu yadribuna wujuhahum wa-adbarahum wadhuqu adhaba al-hariqi

ayah: ذَٰلِكَ بِمَا قَدَّمَتۡ أَيۡدِيكُمۡ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَيۡسَ بِظَلَّـٰمٖ لِّلۡعَبِيدِ
ayah_translit: dhalika bima qaddamat aydikum wa-anna al-laha laysa bizallamin lil'abidi
ayah_english: That (is) for what sent forth your hands And indeed Allah (is) not unjust to His slaves

ayah: كَدَأۡبِ ءَالِ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡۚ كَفَرُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ فَأَخَذَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ بِذُنُوبِهِمۡۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ قَوِيّٞ شَدِيدُ ٱلۡعِقَابِ
ayah_translit: kadabi ali fir'awna wa-alladhina min qablihim kafaru biayati al-lahi fa-akhadhahumu al-lahu bidhunubihim inna al-laha qawiyyun shadidu al-'iqabi
ayah_english: Like (the) way (of) people (of) Firaun and those who (were) from before them They disbelieved in (the) Signs (of) Allah so seized them Allah for their sins Indeed Allah (is) All-Strong (and) severe (in) the penalty

ayah: كَدَأۡبِ ءَالِ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡۚ كَفَرُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ فَأَخَذَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ بِذُنُوبِهِمۡۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ قَوِيّٞ شَدِيدُ ٱلۡعِقَابِ

ayah: كَدَأۡبِ ءَالِ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡۚ كَفَرُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ فَأَخَذَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ بِذُنُوبِهِمۡۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ قَوِيّٞ شَدِيدُ ٱلۡعِقَابِ
ayah_translit: kadabi ali fir'awna wa-alladhina min qablihim kafaru biayati al-lahi fa-akhadhahumu al-lahu bidhunubihim inna al-laha qawiyyun shadidu al-'iqabi
ayah_english: Like (the) way (of) people (of) Firaun and those who (were) from before them They disbelieved in (the) Signs (of) Allah so seized them Allah for their sins Indeed Allah (is) All-Strong (and) severe (in) the penalty

ayah: كَدَأۡبِ ءَالِ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡۚ كَفَرُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ فَأَخَذَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ بِذُنُوبِهِمۡۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ قَوِيّٞ شَدِيدُ ٱلۡعِقَابِ
ayah_translit: kadabi ali fir'awna wa-alladhina min qablihim kafaru biayati al-lahi fa-akhadhahumu al-lahu bidhunubihim inna al-laha qawiyyun shadidu al-'iqabi
ayah_english: Like (the) way (of) people (of) Firaun and those who (were) from before them They disbelieved in (the) Signs (of) Allah so seized them Allah for their sins Indeed Allah (is) All-Strong (and) severe (in) the penalty

ayah: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَمۡ يَكُ مُغَيِّرٗا نِّعۡمَةً أَنۡعَمَهَا عَلَىٰ قَوۡمٍ حَتَّىٰ يُغَيِّرُواْ مَا بِأَنفُسِهِمۡ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٞ
ayah_translit: dhalika bi-anna al-laha lam yaku mughayyiran ni'matan an'amaha ala qawmin hatta yughayyiru ma bi-anfusihim wa-anna al-laha sami'un alimun
ayah_english: That (is) because Allah not is One Who changes a favor which He had bestowed on a people until they change what (is) in themselves And indeed Allah (is) All-Hearing All-Knowing

ayah: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَمۡ يَكُ مُغَيِّرٗا نِّعۡمَةً أَنۡعَمَهَا عَلَىٰ قَوۡمٍ حَتَّىٰ يُغَيِّرُواْ مَا بِأَنفُسِهِمۡ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٞ

ayah: كَدَأۡبِ ءَالِ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡۚ كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِ رَبِّهِمۡ فَأَهۡلَكۡنَٰهُم بِذُنُوبِهِمۡ وَأَغۡرَقۡنَآ ءَالَ فِرۡعَوۡنَۚ وَكُلّٞ كَانُواْ ظَٰلِمِينَ
ayah_translit: kadabi ali fir'awna wa-alladhina min qablihim kadhabu biayati rabbihim fa-ahlaknahum bidhunubihim wa-aghraqna ala fir'awna wakullun kanu zalimina
ayah_english: Like (the) way (of) people (of) Firaun and those who (were) from before them They denied (the) Signs (of) their Lord so We destroyed them for their sins and We drowned (the) people (of) Firaun and (they) all were wrongdoers

ayah: كَدَأۡبِ ءَالِ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡۚ كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِ رَبِّهِمۡ فَأَهۡلَكۡنَٰهُم بِذُنُوبِهِمۡ وَأَغۡرَقۡنَآ ءَالَ فِرۡعَوۡنَۚ وَكُلّٞ كَانُواْ ظَٰلِمِينَ

ayah_english: Like (the) way (of) people (of) Firaun and those who (were) from before them They denied (the) Signs (of) their Lord so We destroyed them for their sins and We drowned (the) people (of) Firaun and (they) all were wrongdoers

ayah: إِنَّ شَرَّ ٱلدَّوَآبِّ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ فَهُمۡ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ
ayah_translit: inna sharra al-dawabi inda al-lahi alladhina kafaru fahum la yu'minuna
ayah_english: Indeed (the) worst (of) the living creatures near Allah (are) those who disbelieve and they (will) not believe

ayah: إِنَّ شَرَّ ٱلدَّوَآبِّ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ فَهُمۡ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

ayah: ٱلَّذِينَ عَٰهَدتَّ مِنۡهُمۡ ثُمَّ يَنقُضُونَ عَهۡدَهُمۡ فِي كُلِّ مَرَّةٖ وَهُمۡ لَا يَتَّقُونَ
ayah_translit: alladhina ahadtta min'hum thumma yanquduna ahdahum fi kulli marratin wahum la yattaquna
ayah_english: Those who you made a covenant with them then they break their covenant [in] every time and they (do) not fear (Allah)

ayah: ٱلَّذِينَ عَٰهَدتَّ مِنۡهُمۡ ثُمَّ يَنقُضُونَ عَهۡدَهُمۡ فِي كُلِّ مَرَّةٖ وَهُمۡ لَا يَتَّقُونَ
ayah_translit: alladhina ahadtta min'hum thumma yanquduna ahdahum fi kulli marratin wahum la yattaquna
ayah_english: Those who you made a covenant with them then they break their covenant [in] every time and they (do) not fear (Allah)

ayah: ٱلَّذِينَ عَٰهَدتَّ مِنۡهُمۡ ثُمَّ يَنقُضُونَ عَهۡدَهُمۡ فِي كُلِّ مَرَّةٖ وَهُمۡ لَا يَتَّقُونَ
ayah_translit: alladhina ahadtta min'hum thumma yanquduna ahdahum fi kulli marratin wahum la yattaquna
ayah_english: Those who you made a covenant with them then they break their covenant [in] every time and they (do) not fear (Allah)

ayah: فَإِمَّا تَثۡقَفَنَّهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡحَرۡبِ فَشَرِّدۡ بِهِم مَّنۡ خَلۡفَهُمۡ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَذَّكَّرُونَ
ayah_translit: fa-imma tathqafannahum fi al-harbi fasharrid bihim man khalfahum la'allahum yadhakkaruna
ayah_english: So if you gain dominance over them in the war disperse by them (those) who (are) behind them so that they may take heed

ayah: فَإِمَّا تَثۡقَفَنَّهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡحَرۡبِ فَشَرِّدۡ بِهِم مَّنۡ خَلۡفَهُمۡ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَذَّكَّرُونَ

ayah: وَإِمَّا تَخَافَنَّ مِن قَوۡمٍ خِيَانَةٗ فَٱنۢبِذۡ إِلَيۡهِمۡ عَلَىٰ سَوَآءٍۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلۡخَآئِنِينَ
ayah_translit: wa-imma takhafanna min qawmin khiyanatan fa-inbidh ilayhim ala sawain inna al-laha la yuhibbu al-khainina
ayah_english: And if you fear from a people betrayal throw back to them on equal (terms) Indeed Allah (does) not love the traitors

ayah: وَإِمَّا تَخَافَنَّ مِن قَوۡمٍ خِيَانَةٗ فَٱنۢبِذۡ إِلَيۡهِمۡ عَلَىٰ سَوَآءٍۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلۡخَآئِنِينَ

ayah_english: And if you fear from a people betrayal throw back to them on equal (terms) Indeed Allah (does) not love the traitors

ayah: وَلَا يَحۡسَبَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ سَبَقُوٓاْۚ إِنَّهُمۡ لَا يُعۡجِزُونَ
ayah_translit: wala yahsabanna alladhina kafaru sabaqu innahum la yu'jizuna
ayah_english: And (let) not think those who disbelieve they can outstrip Indeed they (can) not escape

ayah: وَلَا يَحۡسَبَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ سَبَقُوٓاْۚ إِنَّهُمۡ لَا يُعۡجِزُونَ

ayah_english: And (let) not think those who disbelieve they can outstrip Indeed they (can) not escape

ayah: وَأَعِدُّواْ لَهُم مَّا ٱسۡتَطَعۡتُم مِّن قُوَّةٖ وَمِن رِّبَاطِ ٱلۡخَيۡلِ تُرۡهِبُونَ بِهِۦ عَدُوَّ ٱللَّهِ وَعَدُوَّكُمۡ وَءَاخَرِينَ مِن دُونِهِمۡ لَا تَعۡلَمُونَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ يَعۡلَمُهُمۡۚ وَمَا تُنفِقُواْ مِن شَيۡءٖ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ يُوَفَّ إِلَيۡكُمۡ وَأَنتُمۡ لَا تُظۡلَمُونَ
ayah_translit: wa-a'iddu lahum ma is'tata'tum min quwwatin wamin ribati al-khayli tur'hibuna bihi aduwwa al-lahi wa'aduwwakum waakharina min dunihim la ta'lamunahumu al-lahu ya'lamuhum wama tunfiqu min shayin fi sabili al-lahi yuwaffa ilaykum wa-antum la tuz'lamuna
ayah_english: And prepare for them whatever you able (to) of force and of tethered horses (to) terrify therewith (the) enemy (the) enemy and your enemy and others from besides them not (do) you know them (but) Allah knows them And whatever you spend from (any) thing in (the) way (of) Allah it will be fully repaid to you and you (will) not be wronged

ayah: وَأَعِدُّواْ لَهُم مَّا ٱسۡتَطَعۡتُم مِّن قُوَّةٖ وَمِن رِّبَاطِ ٱلۡخَيۡلِ تُرۡهِبُونَ بِهِۦ عَدُوَّ ٱللَّهِ وَعَدُوَّكُمۡ وَءَاخَرِينَ مِن دُونِهِمۡ لَا تَعۡلَمُونَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ يَعۡلَمُهُمۡۚ وَمَا تُنفِقُواْ مِن شَيۡءٖ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ يُوَفَّ إِلَيۡكُمۡ وَأَنتُمۡ لَا تُظۡلَمُونَ

ayah: وَأَعِدُّواْ لَهُم مَّا ٱسۡتَطَعۡتُم مِّن قُوَّةٖ وَمِن رِّبَاطِ ٱلۡخَيۡلِ تُرۡهِبُونَ بِهِۦ عَدُوَّ ٱللَّهِ وَعَدُوَّكُمۡ وَءَاخَرِينَ مِن دُونِهِمۡ لَا تَعۡلَمُونَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ يَعۡلَمُهُمۡۚ وَمَا تُنفِقُواْ مِن شَيۡءٖ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ يُوَفَّ إِلَيۡكُمۡ وَأَنتُمۡ لَا تُظۡلَمُونَ

ayah: وَأَعِدُّواْ لَهُم مَّا ٱسۡتَطَعۡتُم مِّن قُوَّةٖ وَمِن رِّبَاطِ ٱلۡخَيۡلِ تُرۡهِبُونَ بِهِۦ عَدُوَّ ٱللَّهِ وَعَدُوَّكُمۡ وَءَاخَرِينَ مِن دُونِهِمۡ لَا تَعۡلَمُونَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ يَعۡلَمُهُمۡۚ وَمَا تُنفِقُواْ مِن شَيۡءٖ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ يُوَفَّ إِلَيۡكُمۡ وَأَنتُمۡ لَا تُظۡلَمُونَ

ayah: وَأَعِدُّواْ لَهُم مَّا ٱسۡتَطَعۡتُم مِّن قُوَّةٖ وَمِن رِّبَاطِ ٱلۡخَيۡلِ تُرۡهِبُونَ بِهِۦ عَدُوَّ ٱللَّهِ وَعَدُوَّكُمۡ وَءَاخَرِينَ مِن دُونِهِمۡ لَا تَعۡلَمُونَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ يَعۡلَمُهُمۡۚ وَمَا تُنفِقُواْ مِن شَيۡءٖ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ يُوَفَّ إِلَيۡكُمۡ وَأَنتُمۡ لَا تُظۡلَمُونَ
ayah_translit: wa-a'iddu lahum ma is'tata'tum min quwwatin wamin ribati al-khayli tur'hibuna bihi aduwwa al-lahi wa'aduwwakum waakharina min dunihim la ta'lamunahumu al-lahu ya'lamuhum wama tunfiqu min shayin fi sabili al-lahi yuwaffa ilaykum wa-antum la tuz'lamuna

ayah: ۞وَإِن جَنَحُواْ لِلسَّلۡمِ فَٱجۡنَحۡ لَهَا وَتَوَكَّلۡ عَلَى ٱللَّهِۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ
ayah_translit: wa-in janahu lilssalmi fa-ij'nah laha watawakkal ala al-lahi innahu huwa al-sami'u al-'alimu
ayah_english: And if they incline to peace then you (also) incline to it and put (your) trust in Allah Indeed He (is) All-Hearer All-Knower

ayah: ۞وَإِن جَنَحُواْ لِلسَّلۡمِ فَٱجۡنَحۡ لَهَا وَتَوَكَّلۡ عَلَى ٱللَّهِۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

ayah_english: And if they incline to peace then you (also) incline to it and put (your) trust in Allah Indeed He (is) All-Hearer All-Knower

ayah: وَإِن يُرِيدُوٓاْ أَن يَخۡدَعُوكَ فَإِنَّ حَسۡبَكَ ٱللَّهُۚ هُوَ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَيَّدَكَ بِنَصۡرِهِۦ وَبِٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ
ayah_translit: wa-in yuridu an yakhda'uka fa-inna hasbaka al-lahu huwa alladhi ayyadaka binasrihi wabil-mu'minina
ayah_english: But if they intend to deceive you then indeed is sufficient for you Allah He (is) the One Who supported you with His help and with the believers

ayah: وَإِن يُرِيدُوٓاْ أَن يَخۡدَعُوكَ فَإِنَّ حَسۡبَكَ ٱللَّهُۚ هُوَ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَيَّدَكَ بِنَصۡرِهِۦ وَبِٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

ayah_english: But if they intend to deceive you then indeed is sufficient for you Allah He (is) the One Who supported you with His help and with the believers

ayah: وَأَلَّفَ بَيۡنَ قُلُوبِهِمۡۚ لَوۡ أَنفَقۡتَ مَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ جَمِيعٗا مَّآ أَلَّفۡتَ بَيۡنَ قُلُوبِهِمۡ وَلَٰكِنَّ ٱللَّهَ أَلَّفَ بَيۡنَهُمۡۚ إِنَّهُۥ عَزِيزٌ حَكِيمٞ
ayah_translit: wa-allafa bayna qulubihim law anfaqta ma fi al-ardi jami'an ma allafta bayna qulubihim walakinna al-laha allafa baynahum innahu azizun hakimun
ayah_english: And He (has) put affection between their hearts If you (had) spent whatever (is) in the earth all not (could) you (have) put affection between their hearts but Allah (has) put affection between them Indeed, He (is) All-Mighty All-Wise

ayah: وَأَلَّفَ بَيۡنَ قُلُوبِهِمۡۚ لَوۡ أَنفَقۡتَ مَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ جَمِيعٗا مَّآ أَلَّفۡتَ بَيۡنَ قُلُوبِهِمۡ وَلَٰكِنَّ ٱللَّهَ أَلَّفَ بَيۡنَهُمۡۚ إِنَّهُۥ عَزِيزٌ حَكِيمٞ

ayah: وَأَلَّفَ بَيۡنَ قُلُوبِهِمۡۚ لَوۡ أَنفَقۡتَ مَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ جَمِيعٗا مَّآ أَلَّفۡتَ بَيۡنَ قُلُوبِهِمۡ وَلَٰكِنَّ ٱللَّهَ أَلَّفَ بَيۡنَهُمۡۚ إِنَّهُۥ عَزِيزٌ حَكِيمٞ

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِيُّ حَسۡبُكَ ٱللَّهُ وَمَنِ ٱتَّبَعَكَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ
ayah_translit: yaayyuha al-nabiyu hasbuka al-lahu wamani ittaba'aka mina al-mu'minina
ayah_english: O Prophet Sufficient for you (is) Allah and whoever follows you of the believers

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِيُّ حَرِّضِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ عَلَى ٱلۡقِتَالِۚ إِن يَكُن مِّنكُمۡ عِشۡرُونَ صَٰبِرُونَ يَغۡلِبُواْ مِاْئَتَيۡنِۚ وَإِن يَكُن مِّنكُم مِّاْئَةٞ يَغۡلِبُوٓاْ أَلۡفٗا مِّنَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِأَنَّهُمۡ قَوۡمٞ لَّا يَفۡقَهُونَ
ayah_translit: yaayyuha al-nabiyu harridi al-mu'minina ala al-qitali in yakun minkum ish'runa sabiruna yaghlibu mi-atayni wa-in yakun minkum mi-atun yaghlibu alfan mina alladhina kafaru bi-annahum qawmun la yafqahuna
ayah_english: O Prophet Urge the believers to [the] fight If (there) are among you twenty steadfast they will overcome two hundred And if (there) are among you a hundred they will overcome a thousand of those who disbelieve because they (are) a people (who do) not understand

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِيُّ حَرِّضِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ عَلَى ٱلۡقِتَالِۚ إِن يَكُن مِّنكُمۡ عِشۡرُونَ صَٰبِرُونَ يَغۡلِبُواْ مِاْئَتَيۡنِۚ وَإِن يَكُن مِّنكُم مِّاْئَةٞ يَغۡلِبُوٓاْ أَلۡفٗا مِّنَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِأَنَّهُمۡ قَوۡمٞ لَّا يَفۡقَهُونَ

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِيُّ حَرِّضِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ عَلَى ٱلۡقِتَالِۚ إِن يَكُن مِّنكُمۡ عِشۡرُونَ صَٰبِرُونَ يَغۡلِبُواْ مِاْئَتَيۡنِۚ وَإِن يَكُن مِّنكُم مِّاْئَةٞ يَغۡلِبُوٓاْ أَلۡفٗا مِّنَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِأَنَّهُمۡ قَوۡمٞ لَّا يَفۡقَهُونَ

ayah: ٱلۡـَٰٔنَ خَفَّفَ ٱللَّهُ عَنكُمۡ وَعَلِمَ أَنَّ فِيكُمۡ ضَعۡفٗاۚ فَإِن يَكُن مِّنكُم مِّاْئَةٞ صَابِرَةٞ يَغۡلِبُواْ مِاْئَتَيۡنِۚ وَإِن يَكُن مِّنكُمۡ أَلۡفٞ يَغۡلِبُوٓاْ أَلۡفَيۡنِ بِإِذۡنِ ٱللَّهِۗ وَٱللَّهُ مَعَ ٱلصَّـٰبِرِينَ
ayah_translit: al-ana khaffafa al-lahu ankum wa'alima anna fikum da'fan fa-in yakun minkum mi-atun sabiratun yaghlibu mi-atayni wa-in yakun minkum alfun yaghlibu alfayni bi-idh'ni al-lahi wal-lahu ma'a al-sabirina
ayah_english: Now has (been) lightened (by) Allah for you and He knows that in you (there) is weakness So if (there) are among you a hundred steadfast they will overcome two hundred And if (there) are among you a thousand they will overcome two thousand with (the) permission (of) Allah And Allah (is) with the steadfast

ayah_english: Now has (been) lightened (by) Allah for you and He knows that in you (there) is weakness So if (there) are among you a hundred steadfast they will overcome two hundred And if (there) are among you a thousand they will overcome two thousand with (the) permission (of) Allah And Allah (is) with the steadfast

ayah: مَا كَانَ لِنَبِيٍّ أَن يَكُونَ لَهُۥٓ أَسۡرَىٰ حَتَّىٰ يُثۡخِنَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ تُرِيدُونَ عَرَضَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَٱللَّهُ يُرِيدُ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةَۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَزِيزٌ حَكِيمٞ
ayah_translit: ma kana linabiyyin an yakuna lahu asra hatta yuth'khina fi al-ardi turiduna arada al-dun'ya wal-lahu yuridu al-akhirata wal-lahu azizun hakimun
ayah_english: Not is for a Prophet that (there) should be for him prisoners of war until he has battled strenuously in the land You desire (the) commodities (of) the world but Allah desires (for you) the Hereafter And Allah (is) All-Mighty All-Wise

ayah: مَا كَانَ لِنَبِيٍّ أَن يَكُونَ لَهُۥٓ أَسۡرَىٰ حَتَّىٰ يُثۡخِنَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ تُرِيدُونَ عَرَضَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَٱللَّهُ يُرِيدُ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةَۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَزِيزٌ حَكِيمٞ

ayah: لَّوۡلَا كِتَٰبٞ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ سَبَقَ لَمَسَّكُمۡ فِيمَآ أَخَذۡتُمۡ عَذَابٌ عَظِيمٞ
ayah_translit: lawla kitabun mina al-lahi sabaqa lamassakum fima akhadhtum adhabun azimun
ayah_english: Had not an ordainment from Allah preceded surely (would) have touched you for what you took a punishment great

ayah: لَّوۡلَا كِتَٰبٞ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ سَبَقَ لَمَسَّكُمۡ فِيمَآ أَخَذۡتُمۡ عَذَابٌ عَظِيمٞ

ayah: فَكُلُواْ مِمَّا غَنِمۡتُمۡ حَلَٰلٗا طَيِّبٗاۚ وَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ
ayah_translit: fakulu mimma ghanim'tum halalan tayyiban wa-ittaqu al-laha inna al-laha ghafurun rahimun
ayah_english: So eat from what you got as war booty lawful (and) good and fear Allah Indeed Allah (is) Oft-Forgiving Most Merciful

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِيُّ قُل لِّمَن فِيٓ أَيۡدِيكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأَسۡرَىٰٓ إِن يَعۡلَمِ ٱللَّهُ فِي قُلُوبِكُمۡ خَيۡرٗا يُؤۡتِكُمۡ خَيۡرٗا مِّمَّآ أُخِذَ مِنكُمۡ وَيَغۡفِرۡ لَكُمۡۚ وَٱللَّهُ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ
ayah_translit: yaayyuha al-nabiyu qul liman fi aydikum mina al-asra in ya'lami al-lahu fi qulubikum khayran yu'tikum khayran mimma ukhidha minkum wayaghfir lakum wal-lahu ghafurun rahimun
ayah_english: O Prophet Say to whoever (is) in your hands of the captives If knows Allah in your hearts any good He will give you better than what was taken from you and He will forgive you And Allah (is) Oft-Forgiving Most Merciful

ayah: وَإِن يُرِيدُواْ خِيَانَتَكَ فَقَدۡ خَانُواْ ٱللَّهَ مِن قَبۡلُ فَأَمۡكَنَ مِنۡهُمۡۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌ
ayah_translit: wa-in yuridu khiyanataka faqad khanu al-laha min qablu fa-amkana min'hum wal-lahu alimun hakimun
ayah_english: But if they intend (to) betray you certainly they have betrayed Allah from before So He gave (you) power over them And Allah (is) All-Knower All-Wise

ayah_english: But if they intend (to) betray you certainly they have betrayed Allah from before So He gave (you) power over them And Allah (is) All-Knower All-Wise

ayah: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَهَاجَرُواْ وَجَٰهَدُواْ بِأَمۡوَٰلِهِمۡ وَأَنفُسِهِمۡ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَاوَواْ وَّنَصَرُوٓاْ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ بَعۡضُهُمۡ أَوۡلِيَآءُ بَعۡضٖۚ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَلَمۡ يُهَاجِرُواْ مَا لَكُم مِّن وَلَٰيَتِهِم مِّن شَيۡءٍ حَتَّىٰ يُهَاجِرُواْۚ وَإِنِ ٱسۡتَنصَرُوكُمۡ فِي ٱلدِّينِ فَعَلَيۡكُمُ ٱلنَّصۡرُ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ قَوۡمِۭ بَيۡنَكُمۡ وَبَيۡنَهُم مِّيثَٰقٞۗ وَٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ بَصِيرٞ
ayah_translit: inna alladhina amanu wahajaru wajahadu bi-amwalihim wa-anfusihim fi sabili al-lahi wa-alladhina awaw wanasaru ulaika ba'duhum awliyau ba'din wa-alladhina amanu walam yuhajiru ma lakum min walayatihim min shayin hatta yuhajiru wa-ini is'tansarukum fi al-dini fa'alaykumu al-nasru illa ala qawmin baynakum wabaynahum mithaqun wal-lahu bima ta'maluna basirun
ayah_english: Indeed those who believed and emigrated and strove hard with their wealth and their lives in (the) way (of) Allah and those who gave shelter and helped those some of them (are) allies (of) another But those who believed and (did) not emigrate (it is) not for you (of) their protection (in) (in) anything until they emigrate And if they seek your help in the religion then upon you (is to) help them except against a people between you and between them (is) a treaty And Allah of what you do (is) All-Seer

ayah_english: Indeed those who believed and emigrated and strove hard with their wealth and their lives in (the) way (of) Allah and those who gave shelter and helped those some of them (are) allies (of) another But those who believed and (did) not emigrate (it is) not for you (of) their protection (in) (in) anything until they emigrate And if they seek your help in the religion then upon you (is to) help them except against a people between you and between them (is) a treaty And Allah of what you do (is) All-Seer

ayah: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَهَاجَرُواْ وَجَٰهَدُواْ بِأَمۡوَٰلِهِمۡ وَأَنفُسِهِمۡ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَاوَواْ وَّنَصَرُوٓاْ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ بَعۡضُهُمۡ أَوۡلِيَآءُ بَعۡضٖۚ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَلَمۡ يُهَاجِرُواْ مَا لَكُم مِّن وَلَٰيَتِهِم مِّن شَيۡءٍ حَتَّىٰ يُهَاجِرُواْۚ وَإِنِ ٱسۡتَنصَرُوكُمۡ فِي ٱلدِّينِ فَعَلَيۡكُمُ ٱلنَّصۡرُ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ قَوۡمِۭ بَيۡنَكُمۡ وَبَيۡنَهُم مِّيثَٰقٞۗ وَٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ بَصِيرٞ

ayah_translit: inna alladhina amanu wahajaru wajahadu bi-amwalihim wa-anfusihim fi sabili al-lahi wa-alladhina awaw wanasaru ulaika ba'duhum awliyau ba'din wa-alladhina amanu walam yuhajiru ma lakum min walayatihim min shayin hatta yuhajiru wa-ini is'tansarukum fi al-dini fa'alaykumu al-nasru illa ala qawmin baynakum wabaynahum mithaqun wal-lahu bima ta'maluna basirun

ayah_english: Indeed those who believed and emigrated and strove hard with their wealth and their lives in (the) way (of) Allah and those who gave shelter and helped those some of them (are) allies (of) another But those who believed and (did) not emigrate (it is) not for you (of) their protection (in) (in) anything until they emigrate And if they seek your help in the religion then upon you (is to) help them except against a people between you and between them (is) a treaty And Allah of what you do (is) All-Seer

ayah: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بَعۡضُهُمۡ أَوۡلِيَآءُ بَعۡضٍۚ إِلَّا تَفۡعَلُوهُ تَكُن فِتۡنَةٞ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَفَسَادٞ كَبِيرٞ
ayah_translit: wa-alladhina kafaru ba'duhum awliyau ba'din illa taf 'aluhu takun fit'natun fi al-ardi wafasadun kabirun
ayah_english: And those who disbelieve some of them (are) allies (to) another If not you do it (there) will be oppression in the earth and corruption great

ayah: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بَعۡضُهُمۡ أَوۡلِيَآءُ بَعۡضٍۚ إِلَّا تَفۡعَلُوهُ تَكُن فِتۡنَةٞ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَفَسَادٞ كَبِيرٞ
ayah_translit: wa-alladhina kafaru ba'duhum awliyau ba'din illa taf 'aluhu takun fit'natun fi al-ardi wafasadun kabirun
ayah_english: And those who disbelieve some of them (are) allies (to) another If not you do it (there) will be oppression in the earth and corruption great

ayah: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بَعۡضُهُمۡ أَوۡلِيَآءُ بَعۡضٍۚ إِلَّا تَفۡعَلُوهُ تَكُن فِتۡنَةٞ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَفَسَادٞ كَبِيرٞ

ayah: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَهَاجَرُواْ وَجَٰهَدُواْ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَاوَواْ وَّنَصَرُوٓاْ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ حَقّٗاۚ لَّهُم مَّغۡفِرَةٞ وَرِزۡقٞ كَرِيمٞ
ayah_translit: wa-alladhina amanu wahajaru wajahadu fi sabili al-lahi wa-alladhina awaw wanasaru ulaika humu al-mu'minuna haqqan lahum maghfiratun wariz'qun karimun
ayah_english: And those who believed and emigrated and strove hard in (the) way (of) Allah and those who gave shelter and helped those they (are) the believers (in) truth For them (is) forgiveness and a provision noble

ayah: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ مِنۢ بَعۡدُ وَهَاجَرُواْ وَجَٰهَدُواْ مَعَكُمۡ فَأُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ مِنكُمۡۚ وَأُوْلُواْ ٱلۡأَرۡحَامِ بَعۡضُهُمۡ أَوۡلَىٰ بِبَعۡضٖ فِي كِتَٰبِ ٱللَّهِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٍ عَلِيمُۢ
ayah_translit: wa-alladhina amanu min ba'du wahajaru wajahadu ma'akum fa-ulaika minkum wa-ulu al-arhami ba'duhum awla biba'din fi kitabi al-lahi inna al-laha bikulli shayin alimun
ayah_english: And those who believed from afterwards and emigrated and strove hard with you then those (are) of you But those (of) blood relationship some of them (are) nearer to another in (the) Book (of) Allah Indeed Allah of every thing (is) All-Knower

ayah: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ مِنۢ بَعۡدُ وَهَاجَرُواْ وَجَٰهَدُواْ مَعَكُمۡ فَأُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ مِنكُمۡۚ وَأُوْلُواْ ٱلۡأَرۡحَامِ بَعۡضُهُمۡ أَوۡلَىٰ بِبَعۡضٖ فِي كِتَٰبِ ٱللَّهِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٍ عَلِيمُۢ

ayah: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ مِنۢ بَعۡدُ وَهَاجَرُواْ وَجَٰهَدُواْ مَعَكُمۡ فَأُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ مِنكُمۡۚ وَأُوْلُواْ ٱلۡأَرۡحَامِ بَعۡضُهُمۡ أَوۡلَىٰ بِبَعۡضٖ فِي كِتَٰبِ ٱللَّهِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٍ عَلِيمُۢ
ayah_translit: wa-alladhina amanu min ba'du wahajaru wajahadu ma'akum fa-ulaika minkum wa-ulu al-arhami ba'duhum awla biba'din fi kitabi al-lahi inna al-laha bikulli shayin alimun
ayah_english: And those who believed from afterwards and emigrated and strove hard with you then those (are) of you But those (of) blood relationship some of them (are) nearer to another in (the) Book (of) Allah Indeed Allah of every thing (is) All-Knower

ayah: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ مِنۢ بَعۡدُ وَهَاجَرُواْ وَجَٰهَدُواْ مَعَكُمۡ فَأُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ مِنكُمۡۚ وَأُوْلُواْ ٱلۡأَرۡحَامِ بَعۡضُهُمۡ أَوۡلَىٰ بِبَعۡضٖ فِي كِتَٰبِ ٱللَّهِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٍ عَلِيمُۢ
